thread.title: Everything coming to Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and HBO Now in February
thread.title_full: Everything coming to Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and HBO Now in February

author: Julia Alexander
title: Everything coming to Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and HBO Now in February
text: share Netflix February is proving to be a good month to catch up on series you may have missed out on or new shows you’ve had your eye on for a while. On the Netflix front, American Crime Story: The People v OJ Simpson , FX’s multiple-award winning series that recounts Simpson’s famous trial, will be available to stream in full on Feb. 2. Netflix’s new original series Santa Clarita Diet , which stars Drew Barrymore as an undead real estate agent alongside Timothy Olyphant, will debut on Feb. 3. This month will also play host to a couple of highly anticipated Netflix original movies, including Girlfriend’s Day and I Don’t Feel at Home in this World Anymore . From Hulu, series premieres of a few shows, including Fox’s 24: Legacy and APB alongside Hulu original The Mindy Project, will all occur next month. As previously announced at a conference last week, the entire collection of Golden Girls will be available to stream on Feb. 13. Adult Swim’s critically acclaimed series, The Boondocks , will also be able to stream in its entirety as of Feb. 18. There are also a couple of new shows and films coming to HBO Now in February. Most importantly, series like Girls, Last Week Tonight with John Oliver and Vice will return for their respective season debuts. This marks Girls’ final season, and the premiere will be available to watch on Feb. 12. One the movie front, a new documentary chronicling metal band Eagles of Death Metal’s return to Paris after a terrorist attack during their show in November 2015, will premiere on Feb. 13. Lastly, for Amazon subscribers, there are a couple of exciting new programs headed to Prime and Video next month. Amazon’s new series, The Collection , will finally premiere on the service and will be exclusive to Prime members. The show follows “a gripping family drama and entrepreneurial fable, set in a post-war Paris fashion house,” according to the company. It will debut on Feb. 10. The complete lists of everything coming to each service can be fond below. Netflix Ashley Madison: Sex, Lies, and Cyber Attacks Babe Babe: Pig in the City Balto Balto 3: Wings of Change Contact
